name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-m365-actions-preview-nodejs
title: Actions across Microsoft 365
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates how to build Teams apps using Actions in the Microsoft 365 app to streamline task management and enhance productivity by minimizing context switching.
longDescription: This sample illustrates how developers can integrate Actions in the Microsoft 365 app to simplify task completion and enhance user productivity. It enables seamless interaction with content, expanding app functionality while reducing the need for switching between applications.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing actions across microsoft 365

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
